main event: An object resembling a star in motion was observed over W. Carrollton, Ohio on 9/18/53, traveling northwest at high speed.
interesting points: The object was seen for about 2 minutes before disappearing from view., The object was described as resembling a star in motion., The conclusion of the observation was that it was a satellite., No physical evidence or photographs were collected in this sighting., The observation was made visually from the ground.
witness description: The observer stated the object was seen at high speed and eventually disappeared.
